my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Bukankah itu anak-anak kecil Si Gayut sebentar tadi?

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Si Gayut, barangkali sedang mencari makanan untuk Si Kecil.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Bijak sekali, @user! Telatah Si Kecil itu melengkap bentuk huruf Hijaiyah 'Shin'.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: @user, can you see what those are?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: You're right, that looks like the letter `Shin`.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: I'm guessing Mr.Monkey was looking for food for them.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: The little monkeys playing around the branches...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: ...looks similar to our second Hijaiyah letter today.
